clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text: <li>Doodle reserves the right to update and change the Terms of Service at any time without notice.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: Some personal data may be kept after the end of the data retention period or a request for erasure
clauses.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)
clauses.clause_text: When deleting a poll, that poll’s information will be deleted from the Doodle application databases but may be archived in some other form for internal analytical purposes to improve the product for you.

case.text: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected
clauses.description: Users agree to use the service and its software as provided and accept that any errors within that software may not be corrected.
clauses.clause_text: (iv) any errors in the Services will be corrected.

case.text: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected

clauses.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
clauses.clause_text: Doodle may share personal information with other companies or individuals only in the following limited circumstances: (i) Doodle has your consent. (ii) Doodle has good faith that there is a legal obligation to share the data.

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
clauses.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.
clauses.clause_text:
In some cases, Doodle displays advertisements from Google’s AdSense or AdExchange network.
These advertisements can be targeted based on the poll content.

case.text: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.
clauses.clause_text:
These advertisements can be targeted based on the information that is available to Doodle, e.g.
language, IP address, poll content, etc.

case.text: Your personal data is used for advertising

clauses.title: Google Analytics and Google Firebase Analytics are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text: Doodle also uses Google Analytics and Google Firebase Analytics (for iOS and Android apps) to compile usage statistics.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: You aren’t forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
clauses.description: Binding Arbitration is a dispute resolution method involving a neutral third party which will render a decision instead of going to court. Since the arbitrator can decide the outgoing of a dispute without evidences or a legal basis, it is preferable that users decide whether they want or not their dispute to be resolved this way.
clauses.clause_text: You and Doodle agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Zurich, Switzerland, to resolve any legal matter arising from the Terms of Service.

case.text: You aren’t forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection (Switzerland)
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.clause_text: "As a basic principle, the Swiss Federal Data Protection Act (FADP) applies to the processing of your personal data." - Privacy policy

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
clauses.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.
clauses.clause_text:
Contact person

If you have questions regarding data protection, need information or want your data to be deleted please contact our data protection office via email: privacy@doodle.com

case.text: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

clauses.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
clauses.description: The service employs your data to target ads to you, but you can opt-out of this interest-based advertising.
clauses.clause_text: You may object at any time by email to the processing of Your Data for marketing and advertising purposes.

case.text: You can opt out of targeted advertising

clauses.title: Your personal data is not sold
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: We do not sell your data to third parties.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the California Consumer Privacy Act.
clauses.clause_text: If you access our services from the State of California, USA, the California Consumer Privacy Act of 2018 (CCPA) may also apply.

case.text: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text: In certain circumstances, for example if you access our offers from a Member State of the European Union, the European Data Protection Regulation 2016/679 (GDPR) may also apply.

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: Doodle has a no refund policy
clauses.description: Payments are final and can't be refunded unless required by law.
clauses.clause_text: <li>Premium Doodle is billed in advance and is non-refundable.

case.text: The service has a no refund policy

clauses.title: This service has a no refund policy with some exceptions
clauses.description: Payments can be refunded if some requirements are fulfilled.
clauses.clause_text: There will be no refunds also in the following explicit cases: unavailability of services, downgrade, unused services, or when the functionality of services is changed.

case.text: This service has a no refund policy with some exceptions

clauses.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
clauses.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.
clauses.clause_text: (ii) the Services will be delivered uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free,

case.text: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: • Your use of the Services is at your sole risk. The Services are provided on an “as is” and “as available” basis.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text: We use this information for internal analytical purposes to improve the product for you.

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your user-account and password.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
clauses.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.
clauses.clause_text: (i) the Services will meet your requirements or expectations,

case.text: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
